profile.name: Guttula Venugopal Swaroop
profile.description: Motivated Computer Science student with strong foundation in DSA and DBMS. Skilled in Python, Java, and web development. Passionate about AI, problem-solving, and team collaboration. Awarded 'Best Volunteer' in NSS.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Educated school students about MS Office applications.
Taught about effective usage and benefits of AI chatbots.
Explained computer organization and architecture concepts.

projects.name: Self-Driving Car Using IoT, Computer Vision and Deep Learning
description: Built a low-cost self-driving car prototype using Raspberry Pi 4 and Python.
Implemented real-time lane detection and obstacle avoidance with OpenCV and sensors.
Used TensorFlow Lite and Hough Transform for image processing and lane tracking.
Integrated IoT with RPi.GPIO, cameras, and DC motors for navigation.

projects.name: YouTube Ad-View Prediction Using Machine Learning
description: Built a regression model to predict YouTube ad views using engagement metrics and metadata.
Trained Linear Regression and Random Forest models; optimized using MSE and R².
Documented with EDA, training, evaluation, and predictions using Python and scikit-learn.
